Question
========
One wants to know if men and women differ in their appreciation of a particular advertising campaign (measured on a scale of 0-10). In addition, the researchers are also interested in the effect of education level (measured by: MBO or below, HBO, WO), so that is also included in the analysis.

What analysis technique is most appropriate for this study?

Answerlist
----------
* MANCOVA
* ANOVA
* ANCOVA
* Mixed design
